synthesis_conditions.light_source: visible light from a fluorescent lamp
synthesis_conditions.yield_percentage: 22% after 45 minutes, 30% after 2 hours, 38% after 5 hours, 42% after 24 hours under mercury lamp UV light
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Increasing water to 6 equivalents did not significantly change the reaction. Higher intensity UV light from a mercury lamp was also tested.

synthesis_conditions.light_source: visible light from a fluorescent lamp
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Recovered from the mother liquor of the synthesis of compound 1.

synthesis_conditions.chemicals_used: UO2(NO3)2(H2O)1.5, two equivalents of potassium benzoate
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Co-crystallizes with compound 1 under certain conditions.

synthesis_conditions.light_source: UV light from a mercury lamp
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Isolated after long irradiation but not in large amounts.

synthesis_conditions.chemicals_used: polymeric uranyl(V) precursor {[UO2(Py)5][KI2(Py)2]}n, two equivalents of potassium benzoate
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Crystallized from pyridine by slow diffusion of hexane.

synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Crystallized from pyridine by slow diffusion of hexane.
